Text: EPEs response to ENRONs Fixed Gas Price offerThis is to confirm my conversation with you this morning pertaining to ENRONs longterm gas supply at a fixed price of MMBtu offer Currently EPE can not accept several of the terms and conditions included in your confirmation draft letter dated January and the attached ENFOLIO EPE appreciates your efforts in attempting to meet our LT gas supply requirements and we look forward to a continued business relationship Thanks Barry

Draft of EPEs LT Gas ContractThank you for dinner on Tues As discussed pls find EPEs draft lontterm gas contract for your review Barry See attached file EPE LT gas contract Feb doc EPE LT gas contract Feb doc
